entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:53 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 3:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
